data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Tunceli.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tunceli, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Tunceli
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Tunceli, Turkey.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Tunceli.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Tunceli.
Lord, remember the Zaza-Dimli people. Make the Zaza-Dimli people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please give the church in the state of Tunceli prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Tunceli that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 32 believers in Tunceli to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
